mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (name, price, image, store_id, create_date_time, modify_date_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{image}, #{storeId}, #{createDateTime}, #{modifyDateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM menu WHERE id = #{id} AND store_id = #{storeId});
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET name = #{name}, image = #{image}, price = #{price}, modify_date_time = #{modifyDateTime} WHERE id = #{id};
